Inject() a previously compressed value into the supplied ulong buffer starting at the indicated bitposition.
Parameters
c
Compressed value to be written
buffer
Where the bits will be written
bitposition
The position in the buffer to start writing at. Ref value will be increased by the bits used.
bcl
Returns
Returns the compressed uint that was serialized.

Compress (encode) a float value using this FloatCrusher, then Inject() that compressed value into the supplied buffer starting at the indicated bitposition.
Parameters
f
Float to be compressed and serialized
buffer
Target primitive buffer to serialize into.
bitposition
The auto-incremented position in the array (in bits) where we will begin reading.
bcl
Returns
Returns the compressed uint that was serialized.
